Class AtomManifest

  • java.lang.Object

      • model.implementations.components.manifests.AtomManifest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manifest

    public class AtomManifest
extends BasicManifest
    Manifest describing an Atom.

    Manifest's GUID - GUID
    ManifestType - ATOM
    Locations - collection of locations
    Content - GUID Content

    Author:
    Simone I. Conte "sic2@st-andrews.ac.uk"
